title: The Falcon and The Winter Soldier
description: NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY AT 12:30 PM. Following the events of “Avengers: Endgame,” Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities and their patience.

title: Karthika Deepam
description: After the birth of their twins, Deepa and Karthik parted ways. How will the little angels bring their parents back together who can't even stand each other?

title: Janaki Kalaganaledu
description: Putting her IPS hopes aside, Janaki marries Ramachandra, a confectioner from a traditional family. Will Rama defy his mother and help Janaki fulfil her dreams?

title: Guppedantha Manasu
description: Vasudhara wants to build a successful professional career for herself. Will she be able to fulfil her dreams when her own father stands against it?

title: Vadinamma
description: The eldest brother and his wife are like parents to the three younger siblings. But things take a turn in the happy family when the brothers get married.

title: Devatha - Anubandhala Alayam
description: Rukmini dedicates her life in caring for her family and in the process, forgoes her own dreams. Will she ever find herself?

title: Chelleli Kaapuram
description: Bhoomi puts her life and happiness at stake for her stepsister and stepmother. Will she find a silver lining in her painful life?

title: Intinti Gruhalakshmi
description: A mother, a wife and a daughter-in-law were Tulasi's only identities, but when these relations turn their back on her, she decides to rediscover herself.

title: Paramapadham Vilayattu
description: A mother or a doctor - what will Gayathri choose to be when she's caught in a web of political conspiracies after a politician in her care is murdered?

title: Shin-chan
description: Shin-chan follows the journey of five-year-old, Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his family, his pet dog Shiro, neighbours, and friends in Kasukabe, Japan.

title: Kasthuri
description: Kasthuri is a medical student while Madhusudhan is a power-hungry politician. What will happen when father and daughter cross paths?

title: Jin Mayajalam
description: A rich magician's life takes a romantic turn when he falls in love. However, it's not a bed of roses when a powerful djinn becomes a thorn on his side.

title: Intiki Deepam Illalu
description: Being an adopted child, Krishnapriya has always longed for love. Will she find that in her arrogant husband and strict mother-in-law?

title: Doraemon
description: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, he’s got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

title: Bangaru Panjaram
description: Circumstances force Mahalakshmi to marry Rajashekhar, a much older man. With fate having played its cruel game, will she manage to break free from this cage?

title: Savitramma
description: Fate has again brought Balaraju and Nandini close to each other. How will Savitramma change Balu's hatred for Nandini into love?

title: Manasichi Choodu
description: When Bhanu is finally about to marry the love of her life, fate plays a cruel game with her, leaving her stuck at crossroads.

title: Kumkuma Puvvu
description: Amrutha, Jayanti's illegitimate daughter, is separated from her mother at birth. But they are destined to reunite.

title: Mahabharatham
description: Watch the rivalry of the Pandavas and Kauravas culminate in the Kurukshetra war in Mahabharatham, driven by the razor-sharp strategies of Krishna, the master puppeteer.

title: Ugadi Specials
description: Glitz, glamour and breathtaking performances! Silver-screen and Maa TV stars come together to welcome the new year with this grand celebration.

title: Gorintaku
description: Srivalli, a young headstrong woman, crosses path with Parthu, a local goon. To what extent would this chalk-and-cheese personalities stay attracted to each other?

title: Neevalle Neevalle
description: One child grows up to become an IPS officer, while the other a local goon. Fate had swapped their lifestyles, but what happens when they confront each other?

title: Dancee +
description: TODAY'S EPISODE IS DELAYED. One set of contestants. Six judges. One ultimate dance title. And the biggest plus of all is the host - Ohmkar.

title: Rudhrama Devi
description: A warrior who shielded her kingdom with utter bravery. Here's a saga that depicts the journey of the iconic Rudhrama Devi from the Kakatiya dynasty.

title: Care of Anasuya
description: Anusuya grooms her daughters to marry them off to rich and affluent families. But what does destiny have in store for them?

title: The Legend of Hanuman
description: When the power-hungry Ravan tore through the world to unleash evil, in his way stood a humble vaanar awoken to his divinity to become an immortal legend.

title: Special Ops
description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

title: RadhaKrishna
description: Radha's love for Lord Krishna knows no bounds. Their eternal  love has stood the test of time. Here's a soulful re-telling of this supreme tale of romance and sacrifice.

title: Hostages
description: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to Nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiracy unfolds.

title: OK Computer
description: When a self-driving car commits murder, a cyber cop and a robot rights activist team up to investigate. Who is to be held accountable? Can we really trust AI?

title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
description: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open-and-shut case.

title: Aarya
description: Aarya Sareen's blissful family life is jeopardised when greed consumes her loved ones. With crime as her legacy, can she escape from what she hates the most?

title: Selfie with Bajrangi
description: Ankush's life changes when he meets a mysterious nine-year-old child named Bajrangi, who is visible to nobody but him. Together, they learn the importance of togetherness, friendship, and trust.

title: Criminal Justice
description: A one-night stand turns into a nightmare when Aditya wakes up covered in blood. All evidence is against him, but he doesn't remember anything. Is he guilty?

title: Live Telecast
description: TV show director Jenifer Matthew will do anything to win the TRP game, and a supposedly haunted house in a sleepy hill station may just be her golden ticket.

title: Sofia The First
description: Sofia, an adventurous little girl becomes a princess overnight after her mom marries the king.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of the Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos’ actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Phineas and Ferb
description: Phineas and Ferb embark on various adventures during their summer vacation, while trying to keep their sister from interfering with their plans.

title: Janaki Ramudu
description: Janaki Ramudu is the classic epic of Ramayana retold through the eyes of the righteous, beautiful and brave Janaki and her immense love for Rama!

title: Bigg Boss
description: Get ready for a fresh dose of entertainment as King Nagarjuna is back with Bigg Boss in an all-new avatar with enthralling drama and mind-boggling twists!

title: Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Spider-man's greatest enemies are back and he needs a new team: a team put together by Spider-man himself including Agent Venom, Iron Spider and Scarlet Spider.

title: City of Dreams
description: An assassination attempt triggers a dirty power struggle between the Gaikwad siblings. With the throne at stake, the lines blur between moral and immoral.

title: Eetaram Illalu
description: Eetaram Illalu is a Telugu romantic drama aired on Maa TV. It's the story of Surya, a loving husband and a self-made man from a traditional family, who helps his ambitious wife Sandhya achieve her dreams of becoming an IPS officer.

title: Start Music
description: Host Suma is back with a brand new season of the music battle in which small-screen celebs will entertain you in this hilarious game show.

title: Ave Kallu
description: After Mohini turns into a witch, her daughter Niyati faces some spine-chilling events that turn her life upside down.

title: Teddy
description: When a loner crosses paths with a live teddy bear, the unusual duo sets off on an adventurous ride to uncover a devious scam and save lives.

title: Agni Sakshi
description: Fate brings together Gowri and Shanker, but how will they fight against all odds to stay united?

title: Mulan
description: Masquerading as a male soldier to protect her father and tested every step of the way, Mulan must harness her inner-strength and embrace her true potential.

title: Disney Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
description: Join Mickey and his friends for some fun in the clubhouse! Help solve problems and puzzles, try out new math skills and learn all about shapes and numbers.

title: Disney The Lion Guard
description: As the second-born cub to The Lion King, Kion is destined to lead the Lion Guard - the team of heroes charged with defending the pride lands.

title: Triples
description: Three besties, one dream café. It's anything but a cakewalk with shifty employees, angry politicians, crazy loan sharks and exes with whys.

title: Marvel's Avengers Assemble
description: The unexpected return of Ultron reunites the Avengers and they must learn what it is to function as a unit again.

title: Comedy Stars
description: The comedy kings are here with their rib-tickling acts to entertain you on weekends. Large doses of laughter guaranteed!

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: With the powerful Thanos on the verge of raining destruction upon the universe, the Avengers will have to risk everything to stop him.

title: Kick Buttowski: Suburban Daredevil
description: With a pint-size body and ginormous guts, Kick is determined to become the world's greatest daredevil.

title: Vir - The Robot Boy
description: A humanoid robot child with superhuman qualities, Vir always saves the day at Fursatganj, but not without his best buddies Imli, Chulbul and Gintu.

title: Elena of Avalor
description: Elena, a brave and adventurous teenager who saves her kingdom from an evil sorceress and must now learn to rule as crown princess.

title: Sundarakanda
description: Sundarakanda is a Telugu mytho-drama show on Star Maa. Abhiram and Mythili try to unite their families, who have been in a tussle since the past 20 years, to complete the pending ritual of 'Seetha Rama Kalyanam'. Will Lord Hanuman become their saviour? Watch all the episodes of this show on Hotstar.

title: Marvel's The Avengers
description: Nick Fury finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster by launching the Avengers initiative.

title: Simple Samosa
description: Samosa, a vibrant and energetic hero, exaggerates his heroic tales sometimes, but he’ll always step up to remedy the situation, and help save the day!
